title: Just Another Complicated Story
description: When Vimal boards a bus to Chennai looking forward to a new life, a filthy coincidence brings him face-to-face with a person from his past. He slips down the rabbit-hole of high-school memories and his darkest times.An obedient student trying to fulfil his father’s expectations, Vimal lives by excelling at academics to get into a good college. But not for long, as the new ties he forms at school consumes him into a growing conflict between a student and a teacher.Soon a tragedy strikes and shatters the family’s peace. As the family recovers, Vimal is left holding a nasty secret with huge consequences that gets him labelled as a pervert. His personal and school life derails to an extent of having no friends and troubled relationships. On top of that, the board exams are just weeks away.Will he be able to clear his name? Will he be able to mend the broken relationships? Will he be able to excel in his board exams? Is there light at the end of the tunnel?
author: M.K. Aarnik
